name: Giant
description:
The giant's greatness does not reside in his size, but in his chest, in his fury, in his despair, in his hatred, in his love...
This "giant", at the time of the photograph, had not yet discovered the smallness of humans, if he knew about their gigantism. He was just a child willing to create and demonstrate his immense size in front of everyone, his doubt, his fury.
I like the illusions of photographs, I like to transform giants into small beings and small beings into giants.

|| twitter @gricioariel || instagram @gricioariel ||  arielgricio.com.br || 
Photographer and visual artist from Brazil.

Digital photography | 2016.
Mendoza, Argentina
By Ariel Gricio
